meanings.definition: A person who spends money extravagantly or wastefully.
meanings.sent1: Some spendthrifts buy things they don't need.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a spendthrift who always buys expensive clothes.
meanings.sent3: The spendthrifts at the mall seemed to enjoy shopping more than anything else.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation as a spendthrift spread like wildfire among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The spendthrifts in the movie spent money like it grew on trees.

meanings.definition: Wasteful or extravagant in spending money.
meanings.sent1: The spendthrifts habits of the rich man led to his financial troubles.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her spendthrifts ways when she saw her empty bank account.
meanings.sent3: The spendthrifts purchases left her with little to show for her money.
meanings.sent4: The spendthrifts lifestyle was unsustainable in the long run.
meanings.sent5: The spendthrifts behavior was a topic of gossip in the neighborhood.
